channel.title: Dungeon World: The Slave-Pit of Drazhu (Wed 8pm PDT, April)
channel.description:
This post is for FOUR sessions. But they have different info. Please read the whole post.
![](/uploads/default/original/2X/7/7b833f3c33008234067f50e64f694f7a69ad30bd.jpeg)
You've been enslaved by the evil lich Drazhu and his vicious minions, who have put you to work digging tunnels to expand Drazhu's underground lair. Life sucks bad! What do you do?
The first of four sessions is a frenetic one-shot for up to 6 players. Some players will use standard DW playbooks. Other players will be given special "zero level pit slave" playbooks. They are really fun!
[date=2019-04-03 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"] → [date=2019-04-03 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"][Prelude, one-shot (6 players)](https://bit.ly/2WiYxGz)
What happens to the survivors of the Slave-Pit of Drazhu? Stay tuned to find out as we flesh out the survivor's backstory and we play to find out what they do next!
This will be a DW series with only 4 players, each with a standard playbook.
[date=2019-04-10 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"] → [date=2019-04-10 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"][Session 1 (4 players)](https://bit.ly/2UVdhuS) [date=2019-04-17 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"] → [date=2019-04-17 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"][Session 2 (4 players)](https://bit.ly/2urXic8) [date=2019-04-24 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"] → [date=2019-04-24 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"][Session 3 (4 players)](https://bit.ly/2uo6qyH)
All sessions will be three hours. Attendance at all four sessions is encouraged, but not required. The last three sessions will only have room for 4 players, however the one-shot will stand on it's own, so just sign on to the wait-list if the following sessions are already full. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. Rules will be taught. Sessions will be recorded.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) will be in use.
